price: Ni na We umanura imvura nyuma y’uko (abantu) biheba, maze agasakaza impuhwe ze. Kandi ni Umurinzi, Ushimwa cyane.
arabic: وَهُوَ ٱلَّذِي يُنَزِّلُ ٱلۡغَيۡثَ مِنۢ بَعۡدِ مَا قَنَطُواْ وَيَنشُرُ رَحۡمَتَهُۥۚ وَهُوَ ٱلۡوَلِيُّ ٱلۡحَمِيدُ

version.title: Kinyarwanda Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Kinyarwanda by The Rwanda Muslims Association team.

meta.transliteration: wahuwa alladhī yunazzilu al-ghaytha min baʿdi mā qanaṭū wayanshuru raḥmatahu wahuwa al-waliyu al-ḥamīdu
